data.title: Pakistan S National Cricket Academy: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Pakistan S National Cricket Academy

data.meta_description: Find Pakistan S National Cricket Academy Latest News, Videos & Pictures on Pakistan S National Cricket Academy and see latest updates, news, information from NDTV.COM. Explore more on Pakistan S National Cricket Academy.

All

News

Videos

'Pakistan S National Cricket Academy' - 13 News Result(s)

Asian News International | Thursday January 18, 2024

Mickey Arthur, Grant Bradburn and Andrew Puttick have resigned from their respective positions at the National Cricket Academy (NCA) in Lahore.

sports.ndtv.com

Press Trust of India | Thursday December 21, 2023

Pakistan's former Test and ODI captain Azhar Ali has applied for the post of Director of the National Cricket Academy (NCA) in Lahore

sports.ndtv.com

Press Trust of India | Wednesday September 27, 2017

Umar had an altercation with Pakistan's head coach Mickey Arthur at the National Cricket Academy last month over practicing there.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Jaideep Ghosh | Tuesday May 23, 2017

Arthur ordered second test after Pakistan's National Cricket Academy cleared Akmal.

sports.ndtv.com

NDTVSports | Monday December 26, 2016

Mahinder Pal Singh, a resident of Nankana Sahib in Lahore, is part of a list of the top 30 emerging cricketers of the country, as per a news report

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Monday April 18, 2016

Mushtaq Ahmed was till recently the bowling coach of the Pakistani cricket team.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Tuesday October 14, 2014

The decision to send Saeed Ajmal for the informal test on his remodeled bowling action was taken after positive reports from the team of experts which is working on correcting the off-spinner's bowling action at the National Cricket Academy in Lahore.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Tuesday December 10, 2013

Gul, who last played for Pakistan in South Africa earlier this year, had undergone a knee surgery in Melbourne in May and is yet to convince the selectors that he is fully fit.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Wednesday July 3, 2013

Talking to reporters in Lahore, where he is training at the National Cricket Academy, the former Pakistan skipper said there was a time when the Indians were derided for not playing positive cricket.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Monday November 5, 2012

The Pakistan Cricket Board has decided to activate its biomechanics laboratory at the National Cricket Academy here after the costly equipment remained unused and neglected for years.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Press Trust of India | Tuesday June 28, 2011

Neither retired nor planning to take up coaching once that happens, but that has not stopped Pakistan's senior batsman Younis Khan from completing a level two coaching course at the National Cricket Academy.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Associated Press | Tuesday July 21, 2009

Former Test captain Aamir Sohail has quit as director of Pakistan's National Cricket Academy due to personal reasons, local media reported on Tuesday.

sports.ndtv.com

Written by Indo-Asian News Service | Thursday July 24, 2008

Pakistan's star cricketers lined up at the National Cricket Academy (NCA) in Lahore on Sunday to undergo dope tests two months before the Champions Trophy.

sports.ndtv.com
